name: Whitespace
description:
THE LORE:
You are a test subject in a science facility and the time has come for you to escape!
There are many who would stop you, but you possess something they don't: the ability to pass through walls.

HOW TO PLAY:
Activate the teleporter and go to the next level.
- You can move around by using the arrow keys.
- You can pass through walls by pressing on SPACE.
- You can pause the game by pressing on ENTER or ESCAPE.

Good luck!
